mapper.select:
SELECT c.*, s.server_name FROM frp c left join frp_server s on c.server_id = s.id left join js_sys_user u on c.user_id = u.user_code
AND c.project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%')
AND c.frp_domain_second like concat('%',#{frpDomainSecond},'%')
AND c.frp_local_port like concat('%',#{frpLocalPort},'%')
AND c.user_id = #{userId} or #{userId} = 'admin'
select * from frp where (frp_domain_second = #{domain} and server_id = #{serverId}) or (project_name = #{proName} and server_id = #{serverId}) limit 1
